body_html: We finally resolved this. We had a tf.cond() buried in the objective function which caused our while_loop to hang. We wound up doing some re-factoring using the tf.where(). Is there a better op which can implement a simple conditional which accepts a single bool scalar (vice a bool mask) and returns a tensor?
